General.Name: Xiamen International Airport Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen International Airport Co.,Ltd engages in the airport operations in China. The company's route network covers various cities in Chinese Mainland and Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan, Southeast Asia and Northeast Asia, Europe, the United States, and Australia. It offers ground services, security and maintenance services, airport logistics, cargo around services, air freight forwarding, car business, aviation services, logistics, bidding agency services, advertising media, and other services. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Xiamen, China. Xiamen International Airport Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Xiamen Xiangye Group Co., Ltd.

2.Name: Mr. Hai Ying  Zeng
2.Title: Sec. to the Board & Deputy GM
